column5: https://youtu.be/8R7hoX0oHL4A weekend in Montreal with the hopes of knocking off a long time bucket list fish.

We used guide Patrick Therrien. Awesome guy, super cool. Very professional and his English is good. If you go, he's the guy you want. He's been featured in some of the outdoor shows and just knows his stuff. Don't be off-put by his French website - I don't speak a lick of French, email or call him. http://www.guidepatricktherrien.com/en/
Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
I was going to ask if you kept any but seen it was C&R only. Lake Winnebago we can spear them in the winter, I tell ya it's some of the best fish i've ever tried smoked.
I bet it's yummy! You can legally keep one, but our guide was C&R only. He wouldn't take you out if you're planning on harvesting. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
